infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Osmosify uses your camera to photograph book pages for text extraction.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Osmosify accesses your photos to select book page images for text extraction.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Osmosify uses speech recognition to check if words are read correctly.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Osmosify needs microphone access to listen when your child reads words aloud.

plugins.microphonePermission: Osmosify needs microphone access to listen when your child reads words aloud.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Osmosify uses speech recognition to check if words are read correctly.
